ids_info.name: balance_of_plant
ids_info.description: Electrical and thermal power balance of the plant

balance_of_plant/gain_plant.documentation: Electricity gain of the plant (ratio of net electric / plant electricity during operation)

balance_of_plant/thermal_efficiency_cycl.documentation: The fractional thermal effiency of the power cycle. Calculated as 1 - Q_out/Q_in

balance_of_plant/thermal_efficiency_plan.documentation: The fractional thermal effiency of the entire BOP thermal plant, inlcudes all of the individual cycles. Calculated as 1 - Q_out/Q_in

balance_of_plant/power_electric_plant_op.documentation: Total electrical power used to operate the plant
Set of systems involved in the electric plant operation
Short string identifier (unique for a given device)
Electrical power used to operate the system
Short string identifier (unique for a given device)
Electrical power used to operate the subsystem

balance_of_plant/power_plant/generator_c.documentation: Conversion efficiency of thermal to electric power of the steam cycle

balance_of_plant/power_plant/power_cycle.documentation: Type of the primary power cycle
Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

balance_of_plant/power_plant/power_elect.documentation: Net electric power produced by thermal plant, equal to power produced by turbines LESS power consumed by pumps and compressors

balance_of_plant/power_plant/total_heat_.documentation: Total heat flow being rejected from the thermal plant
Total heat flow being supplied to the thermal plant (fusion thermal power)

balance_of_plant/power_plant/system.documentation: Set of subsystems or circuits of the power conversion system, connected by their edges, e.g. divertor cooling loop

balance_of_plant/power_plant/system/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

balance_of_plant/power_plant/system/comp.documentation: Set of components of the power conversion system
Short string identifier (unique for a given device)
Set of ports (input or output) of the component
Mass flow rate of the fluid
Shaft power associated with the component, (+) = into the system, (-) = out of the system
Heat transfer rate of the component, (+) = into the system, (-) = out of the system
